did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection includes three ledger books from a shoemaker in North Carolina. Dating from 1851 to at least 1860, they contain customer lists, orders, and records of payments.

userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Shoemaker Ledgers (North Carolina) must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection includes three ledger books from a shoemaker in North Carolina. Dating from 1851 to at least 1860, they contain customer lists, orders, and records of payments.
